verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God of our fathers, whose Almighty hand newline Leads forth in beauty all the starry band newline Of shining worlds in splendor through the skies, newline Our grateful songs before Thy throne arise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thy love divine hath led us in the past. newline In this free land by Thee our lot is cast. newline Be Thou our Ruler, Guardian, Guide, and Stay, newline Thy word our law, Thy paths our chosen way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: From war's alarms, from deadly pestilence, newline Be Thy strong arm our ever sure defense. newline Thy true religion in our hearts increase; newline Thy bounteous goodness nourish us in peace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Refresh Thy people on their toilsome way. newline Lead us from night to never ending day. newline Fill all our lives with love and grace divine; newline And glory, laud, and praise be ever Thine.
